Here is my resume:
RYAN
MIODUSKI
(703) 965 6785 ryan@mioduski.us Linkedin.com/in/ryan-mioduski Washington, D.C.
EDUCATION
VIRGINIA POLYTECHIC INSTITUTE AND STATE UNIVERSITY (VIRGINIA TECH)
Blacksburg, Virginia
B.A, Political Science and Government 2012 - 2016
LEAD ACCOUNTS
350.org
Ady Barkan’s Be a Hero
Justice Democrats
Lucas Kunce for Senate Morgan Harper for Senate Rana Abdelhamid for Congress Working Families Party
PROFICIENCIES
ActionKit, Action Network, Data Studio, Datorama, Supermetrics, Tag Manager
NICE TO MEET YOU
As a technologist with more than four years of experience in digital advertising for political candidates and causes, I seek to help my clients exceed their online fundraising goals and reach persuadable audiences with data-proven messaging and strategy.
WORK EXPERIENCE SENIOR ADVERTISING STRATEGIST
Middle Seat Consulting | 2021 – Present
Leading strategy and execution on some of Middle Seat's largest accounts in addition to overseeing reporting deliverables and client-facing dashboards.
• Oversaw development of agency-wide attribution and reporting scheme
• Managed client relationships and internal teams to regularly meet or exceed
client objectives
• Directed the reporting committee’s tasks and objectives since September 2021
DIGITAL ADVERTISING STRATEGIST
Middle Seat Consulting | 2020 – 2021
Supported the Biden Victory Fund account in a key role in bridging the gap between the campaign's data analysis team and Middle Seat. Led small to medium accounts consecutively.
• Helped raise $100MM in 100 days for the Biden Victory Fund
• Regularly achieved profitability within 9 months with ongoing investments in email acquisition for a global environmental non-profit totaling more than $240k
DIGITAL CAMPAIGNS ASSOCIATE
Blueprint Interactive | 2018 – 2020
Helped create, optimize, and report on digital advertising campaigns for clients including major Senate IEs, unions, candidates, and PACs.
DIGITAL INTERN
U.S. House of Representatives | Non-consecutive
Served multiple committees and members including the Office of the Democratic Whip, Oversight and Reform, and Representative Rosa DeLauro.

Let me know when you are ready for feedback from my boss.
I'm ready for the feedback from your boss. Please provide the comments from your performance evaluations, and I'll use that information to help polish your LinkedIn profile.

Employer Comments

Ryan is a year into his tenure as a Senior Advertising Strategist at Middle Seat. He’s been challenged throughout his time at Middle Seat with clients of various sizes - Morgan Harper, Biden Victory Fund, Lucas Kunce, 350.org, and recently, Greg Casar. I’m also excited for him to lead efforts on Courier Newsroom alongside Bri and Alexis. 

Feedback from coworkers:
Ryan is very much an analytical thinker, and his perspective and thoughtful insight are very useful for optimizing campaigns and increasing performance. He's been instrumental in increasing fundraising for Fetterman and we are running more efficient, high-performing campaigns because of him.
Ryan is a fantastic team player, he's always available to own projects and jumps right into new accounts and challenges. I've come to really appreciate how quickly he comes in to support.
Ryan could do more when it comes to training junior employees. He does a good job explaining his analysis when optimizing ads, for example, but I don't think he's making sure more junior employees are really grasping why he's making these decisions. One way he could help ensure they understand is by double checking for understanding, or asking how the junior employee is doing their own analysis when completing the same task to see if they've picked up on any of the same analysis he is doing.
—---------
Ryan has shown great mentorship skills recently on team Fetterman, working closely with Alexis to help her better understand ad ops, and walking her through his processes and strategy.
Overall, I feel like an area for improvement for Ryan has always been more communication. I know he and Sheila have been working on some reporting committee projects, such as building data studio reports, but it would be awesome to hear about those updates in the ads-reporting slack channel. I’m sure there are folks on the team who would be interested in learning or contributing to this work, and that many client accounts would be interested in setting up similar reports.
—-------------
Ryan is super reliable, can always be trusted to tackle any given task and complete it in a timely manner, and often goes above and beyond what’s asked of him in any given situation
Great attention to detail, Ryan is extremely thorough and always produces thoughtful work that requires little or no editing
Great pinch hitter, when any issues arise Ryan enthusiastically jumps in to diagnose and troubleshoot- especially when it comes to reporting

Based on the information you provided, here's your updated LinkedIn profile:

With a track record of successfully managing a diverse range of clients, including the Biden Victory Fund, Morgan Harper, Lucas Kunce, and 350.org, I bring a results-oriented mindset and a strong commitment to teamwork and mentorship.

🔸 Mentor and support junior employees in ad optimization and analysis

Digital Advertising Strategist

🔸 Successfully achieved profitability within 9 months for a global environmental non-profit with ongoing investments in email acquisition totaling more than $240k

Digital Campaigns Associate

🔸 Created, optimized, and reported on digital advertising campaigns for clients, including major Senate IEs, unions, candidates, and PACs
